column2: allan j. age 63. born to eternal life on june 7
column3: 2015. loving father of kelly quindt (fiance brett marchetti). proud grandpa of alexis grady. dear brother of sandy keith
column4: dennis (linda) and john. further survived by a nephew
column6: other family and friends. memorial gathering at the funeral homeon sat. june 13th from 3-5pm. funeral service with the reverend. michael fazio presiding at 5pm.
